channel.title: Help Plz? /*Shops*/
channel.description:
Howzit going everyone,
I'm making my server.. and im not totally a java nub.. and I was adding shops.. And i added the autospawn thing so the NPC's are there, and the things in Client.Java and Shops.Cfg but when i try to access the shop nothing happens, and in some cases D/C's me and then logs me back in..
[glow=red,2,300]HeLp PlOx?[/glow]

item.title: Help Plz? /*Shops*/
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Go to the tutorials section, click on “TUTORIAL LIST:::” and look for the tutorial by “x x x x2” on this. Then, if you still can’t get it, read through the topic, as I have answered just about every question that anyone could possibly have on adding shops there.

-Alexia

Read full topic
